bio: I'm a passionate developer from Germany with 6+ years of programming experience since 2019. I run a 2-node Proxmox homelab where I self-host NextCloud, Pelican, AzuraCast, Element, and many more. Currently experimenting with OwnTracks, Zabbix, and bewCloud. Always curious, always shipping.
